name: Ring of Tarrasque
description: An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.
additionalInfo: This item was revealed first in Artifact

The name "Tarrasque" references the Tarrasque, an almost undefeatable monster in Dungeons & Dragons, which in return references the Tarasque, a mythological dragon-hybrid that was tamed by Saint Martha
Builds into Heart of Tarrasque, Pipe of Insight, and Refresher Orb
